meanings.definition: Fellas: informal term for men or boys
meanings.sent1: The fellas played basketball at the park.
meanings.sent2: The fellas are going camping this weekend.
meanings.sent3: Hey fellas, want to grab some pizza after the game?
meanings.sent4: The fellas are like a pack of wolves, always sticking together.
meanings.sent5: I'll never forget the fellas who helped me move into my new apartment.

meanings.definition: Fellas: used to address a group of male friends or acquaintances
meanings.sent1: Fellas, check out this new video game I got!
meanings.sent2: Oh fellas, you crack me up with your jokes.
meanings.sent3: Fellas, can you believe how fast time flies when we're having fun?
meanings.sent4: When the fellas are together, it's like a party wherever we go.
meanings.sent5: Hey fellas, let's make some unforgettable memories this summer!
